title: unnuyir vErillai
sahitya:
unnuyir vErillai mannuyir vErillai uNarvAi nI maDa nenjamE


anupallavi

  ennadiyAn enrE tannalam pENi nI enda uyirinukkum tondaravAghAdE


caraNam    kalagham sheyya matangaLai vilagi ninrE podu nalam sheidu mAndaraik-kulamonrAi nEsittE
malai aruvi pOlE ulagukk-upakAriyAi vAzhndu sel vAzhkkaiyin Azhnda payan iduvE
